entry.title: $2108 // BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT ON UPPER EAST SIDE MANHATTAN! LIVE-IN SUPER
entry.content: This is a No Fee studio apartment in a charming pre-war walk-up building steps away from the Q and 6 Train. Located in the heart of the Upper East Side. The area offers a convenient location to find a vast array of neighborhood shops and restaurant choices ranging from casual eating to fine dining. This building features a renovated lobby and hallways with new Oak entryway doors, slate floor tiling and marble staircases throughout. The fa√ßade has been recently updated new paint and repointed brick. Apartments feature: Queen Size Bedrooms Ebony or Walnut Hardwood Floors Recessed Lighting Carrara Marble or Granite Counter-tops Stainless Steel Appliances Espresso cabinets Crown and Baseboard Moldings Luxury Bathrooms w/ intricate mosaic tile-work or Luxury Marble Tiles Some apartments feature Premium Bosch or LG Washer & Dryers.
